item.title: Google Trends Visualization using R
item.description: In this post, we will visualize Google Trends search hits using R. We will combine the results of google trends with the world map figure. Here, we extract google search results on Sea games from 2004 in the Southeast Asia countries and plot the hits on the map. First of all, we need some packages. For capturing the google search hits, we use gtrendsR. To get the world map, we use the R package called maps.
